Art. 4.122. 
Action for payment
 An action for payment of the compensation provided for in articles 4.119 and 4.120 must be brought within three years of the cessation of the operation or the disposal giving rise thereto, failing which it will be time-barred.
 Any of the former co-owners or their heirs may apply to the Family Court of the judicial district in which the property with the highest cadastral income is located.
